entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
